name: oie consultants
goal: OIE CONSULTANT is a London based consultancy in  legal advocacy, public affairs and networking. Specifically focusing on the interest of clients with immigration, housing, landlord and tenant issue, employment, forms and application filing, arbitration and sectors within the European Union Relevant policy implementation, public relations and communication activities such as projects, events and publications
interests: Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights
